properties.comment: Properties specific to "publishing" a Kuali project
properties.entry:
• Publish this project for public use.
    1. Deploy artifacts to S3 using the "kuali-release" profile
    2. Attach sources/javadoc/gpg signature/site descriptor/test classes
    4. Embed SCM info in jars/wars
    5. Invoke site-deploy to publish the Maven web site
